entry.title: New release for VoucherVault: v1.22.0
entry.content:
[!TIP] Improved API statistic endpoint. Specific item details are available now.

May read the wiki here.

Features

  • improve stats api endpoint (9a22796), closes #92

Full Changelog: https://github.com/l4rm4nd/VoucherVault/compare/v1.21.10...v1.22.0
